name: oblique-strategies
title: Oblique Strategies
description: Over One Hundred Worthwhile Dilemmas by Brian Eno and Peter Schmidt
author: dnnsmnstrr

commands.name: search-oblique-strategies
commands.title: Search Oblique Strategies
commands.description: Find specific strategies from a list spanning all editions of Oblique Strategies

commands.name: generate-new-oblique-strategy
commands.title: Generate New Oblique Strategy
commands.description: Attempt to generate a new strategy using AI

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
